this was the place my husband and i dined on our first night in barcelona and it was  a great choice!  this is a wonderful place for couples, friends and families to get together and really have an enjoyable time dining. our server was very nice and attentive.  he suggested on a delightful rose wine.  we also started with the fried artichoke appetizer.  for the entree my husband had the assortment of grilled meats and i had the sole meuniere which was prepared table side.  both entrees we exquisite!  lovely dinner, lovely city, lovely time!
